input.sentences: the day after the snow storm was cold but sunny .
it was a quite morning after the snow storm last night .
not many people went to the park after the snow storm last night .
the artist told us that he wanted to show the workers who brought food to our table .
these paintings were very well received by the critics last night .
output.sentences: The day was sunny after the snow storm.
The storm had dropped snow all through the night.
Now, however, the road was clear of snow for the people and the storm had ended.
The man at the table told me the painting was of field workers from some time ago.
When I left for the night, I left with the memories I received of  paintings in earthy tones.
